jobs.title: Senior Java Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Java Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for designing and developing high-quality applications.
jobs.requirements: 5+ years of Java development experience, Strong knowledge of Spring Boot, Experience with microservices architecture, Proficiency in AWS cloud services

jobs.title: SOC Analyst
jobs.description: Join our Security Operations Center team to monitor, detect, and respond to security threats.
jobs.requirements: 2+ years in SOC operations, Strong knowledge of SIEM tools, Experience with Linux systems, Understanding of network protocols

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Create beautiful and responsive user interfaces for our web applications.
jobs.requirements: 3+ years of React experience, Strong JavaScript/TypeScript skills, Experience with modern CSS frameworks, Figma proficiency

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Work on cutting-edge AI/ML projects to solve complex business problems.
jobs.requirements: Strong Python programming, Experience with ML frameworks, SQL expertise, Statistical analysis skills

jobs.title: Cloud Engineer
jobs.description: Design and implement cloud infrastructure solutions using Azure.
jobs.requirements: 3+ years of Azure experience, Terraform/IaC knowledge, DevOps practices, Container orchestration

jobs.title: MERN Stack Developer
jobs.description: Build full-stack web applications using the MERN stack.
jobs.requirements: 2+ years MERN experience, Strong JavaScript fundamentals, REST API development, MongoDB expertise

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Streamline our development and deployment processes with DevOps best practices.
jobs.requirements: Strong Linux knowledge, Experience with Jenkins/GitLab CI, Kubernetes expertise, Scripting skills

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Create intuitive and beautiful user experiences for our products.
jobs.requirements: 4+ years of UI/UX design experience, Figma expert, User research skills, Portfolio required

jobs.title: Python Backend Developer
jobs.description: Develop robust backend systems using Python and Django.
jobs.requirements: 3+ years Python experience, Django/Flask expertise, PostgreSQL knowledge, RESTful API design

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Build native mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
jobs.requirements: React Native or Flutter experience, Mobile UI/UX best practices, App store deployment experience

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
jobs.description: Conduct security assessments and vulnerability testing for enterprise systems.
jobs.requirements: 3+ years in cybersecurity, VAPT experience, CEH or similar certification, Knowledge of OWASP Top 10

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Build end-to-end web applications with modern technologies.
jobs.requirements: 5+ years full-stack development, Strong JavaScript/TypeScript, Database design, Cloud deployment
